product_name: JetBlack Cycling S1 Sport Magnetic Bike Trainer
long_description: A better kind of basic, the S1 Sport Trainer is a single-geared magnetic resistance bike trainer that won't break your budget. It's perfect for indoor training when the weather outside gets nasty.
short_description: A better kind of basic, the S1 Sport Trainer is a single-geared magnetic resistance bike trainer that won't break your budget. It's perfect for indoor training when the weather outside gets nasty.
